Parameters.Name: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Outpout Configurations

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: AOC1 SendPrimacyOptions = www.onvif.org/ver20/HalfDuplex/Client
Test.Description: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Check SendPrimacy field. AOC1 SendPrimacyOptions = www.onvif.org/ver20/HalfDuplex/Auto
Test.Description: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: AOC without SendPrimacy field
Test.Description: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Empty MediaProfile Configurations in GetProfiles. Empty GetAOCResponse when profileToken specified
Test.Description: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profiles without AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and empty profileList

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Return 2 AOC in GetAudioOutputConfigurations when profile was provide
Test.Description: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile without AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Empty audioOutputConfCompleteList (step 5)
Test.Description: Incorrect response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: audioOutputConfCompleteList contains two items with the same @token (6 step)
Test.Description: Incorrect response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: In 3rd GetAudioOutputConfigurations audioOutputConfList is empty (7.3 step)
Test.Description: Incorrect response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: In 3rd GetAudioOutputConfigurations audioOutputConfList contains more than one item (7.4 step)
Test.Description: Incorrect response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: In 3rd GetAudioOutputConfigurations audioOutputConfList does not contain item with @token = audioOutputConfiguration.@token (7.5 step)
Test.Description: Incorrect response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: GetAudioOutputConfigurationsResponse after GetProfiles: audioOutputConfList contains at list two items with the same @token (10.3 step)
Test.Description: Incorrect response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: GetAudioOutputConfigurationsResponse after GetProfiles: audioOutputConfCompleteList does not contain at least one item with @token from audioOutputConfList (10.4 step)
Test.Description: Incorrect response - empty AudioOutputConfigurationsList when profile specified

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: GetAudioOutputConfigurationsResponse after GetProfiles: audioOutputConfCompleteList does not contain one item with @token from audioOutputConfList but exist in GetProfiles (step 10.4)
Test.Description: Incorrect response - audioOutputConfCompleteList does not contain AOC token from GetAudioOutputConfigurationsResponse

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Incorrect response - last GetAudioOutputConfigurations when profile is specified. token different than in Getprofile
Test.Description: GetAudioOutputConfigurationsResponse after GetProfiles: audioOutputConfList does not contain item with @token = profile.Configurations.AudioOutput.@token (10.5.1)

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: GetAOC with profile specified return 2 AOC 1 of them not exist in AOC completeList
Test.Description: If audioOutputConfCompleteList does not contain at least one item with @token from audioOutputConfList, FAIL the test and skip other steps. Incorrect response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Incorrect response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfCompleteList and profile with 2 AOC
